com.poesys.accounting.db.account

Interface ICapitalAccount

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto>, IAccount, com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto, com.poesys.db.dto.IObserver, com.poesys.db.dto.ISubject, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCapitalAccount, AbstractCapitalAccountProxy, CapitalAccount, CapitalAccountProxy

    public interface ICapitalAccount
extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto, IAccount

    A data-access layer data-transfer-object interface for the CapitalAccount. The data-transfer-object class and proxy class implement this interface, as does the business-layer data-transfer-object class.

    Stereotypes:

    • Persistent

    Class is read/write: true

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
